Posts.Content: Oct 3, 2016 12:11AM Chamisa wrote: I told my surgeon (breast oncology surgeon) that I wanted to be flat, no reconstruction,and no dog ears. He said dog ears were from the fat on my sides and back and said "I'm not going to go around your back!" And yes, now I have dog ears even though my chest is relatively flat. ☹️ So at some later date I'll have to see a plastic surgeon about them, hopefully they can be fixed in the office. I am 3.5 months post-op.
Posts.Title: Dog Ears? lisa-e debiann
